title: Xbox has a shovelware problem — 40% of 2025 releases were Gamerscore spam, according to a new report
full_text: Xbox has a shovelware problem — 40% of 2025 releases were Gamerscore spam, according to a new report. New data from TrueAchievements reveals that nearly 40% of Xbox games released in 2025 were spam titles designed around easy Gamerscore. The report highlights growing storefront clutter and Gamerscore inflation.. Xbox Achievements is a system that rewards players with Gamerscore for completing specific objectives, from just finishing levels to more obscure things like challenges. For many players, they add ex… [+3351 chars]
